Name: Arpsic
About the game: Have you ever tried to understand musical notation? With Arpsic, you can train yourself with intuitive lessons, learn the treble clef, bass clef, and more! With a straightforward interface, free piano, and experience points to help you in your music journey. 4 clefs to practice music notation. Free play mode with a midi piano full of weird sounds. 10+ piano voices. 10+ songs to learn, with more on the way. Gain experience points and level up your skills. Get rewards and unlock new features. Practice your rhythm. Arpsic theme created by Komiku /
